title: Pluribus
overview: The most miserable person on Earth must save the world from happiness.
reason: From 'Breaking Bad' creator Vince Gilligan, this Apple TV+ show has garnered exceptional critical praise with an 87 Metacritic score and an 8.6 IMDb rating from over 26,000 votes, indicating widespread acclaim.

title: Task
overview: In the working-class suburbs of Philadelphia, an FBI agent heads a task force assembled to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.
reason: This HBO series is highly anticipated, featuring A-list actor Mark Ruffalo and acclaimed creator Brad Ingelsby. It boasts an excellent 8.0 IMDb rating from over 45,000 votes and a strong 77 Metacritic score.
